p: Bremermann and Thieme [1989] analyzed system ( 7) for mass action incidence with the assumption of density‐dependent births, Λ= Nf( N), where f is a strictly decreasing function of N, f(0) > m and f( N) < m for N large. In this case, a unique disease‐free state for N is the solution K > 0 satisfying f( K) = b. The pathogen reproduction number is given by ( 8). It is also the case for this model that disease does not drive the population to extinction.
